title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2391 - Service Of Process
content:

State Regulations
§ 2391.1 - Purpose
§ 2391.2 - Principal offices
§ 2391.3 - Service of legal process on the department (except the Division of Tax Appeals or the Tax Appeals Tribunal) and the Commissioner of Taxation and Finance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2391

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171, subd. First; Civil

Practice Law and Rules, § 307

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
